description_dict.grammatical_description: Interrogative ellipsis asking for purpose; wh-question without an explicit predicate
description_dict.comments: Mapped the wh-question to a generic 'ask' predicate of type 'other' with the existential 'what' as its content. Suggest adding a dedicated 'question' predicate type or an interrogative feature for clearer representation.
